# EE519-231608 Upgraded Fender System and Replacement of Fender System, Cap-aux-Meules Port

**Solicitation Details**

[English]

**Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Reference Number:** WS3839962308

**Solicitation Number:** WS3839962308

**Publication Date:** January 24, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 24, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT

**Type of Contract and Awarding Method:** Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP) - Open Bidding

**Project Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Upgraded Fender System and Replacement of Fender System, Cap-aux-Meules Port. The successful bidder will need to deliver the work in accordance with the specifications outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Issuing Agency and Partnerships:**

The Department of Transport (TC) and the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) are also stakeholders of this project. The project aims to improve the marine infrastructure and upgrade the Fender System at Cap-aux Mueles Port to ensure safe and efficient navigation of vessels.

**Background and Objectives:**

The current Fender System is in need of upgrading and replacement to ensure the safety and efficient navigation of vessels at the Cap-aux Mueles Port. This project will provide an opportunity for businesses to bid on the Upgraded Fender System and Replacement of Fender System, contributing to the marine infrastructure development for the region.

**Description and Requirements:**

* The Fender System upgrade and replacement project requires vested experience in marine construction services. Suppliers will need to demonstrate their ability to complete the work, in compliance with Departmental standards.
* The successful bidder will need to submit a comprehensive bid, including the mandatory supporting documentation, not later than 14:00 hours on February 24, 2023.

**Evaluation Criteria and Procurement Categories:**

The procurement of this project is categorized as `CNST`, Competitive Bidding. The successful bidder will be selected on the basis of the lowest price offered while meeting all the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Interested Bidders:**

All bidders must submit a comprehensive bid, meeting the requirements outlined in this Request for Proposal (RFP), in compliance with the Evaluation Criteria.
